description: This file defines the Response class for WebSockets JSON-RPC responses, inheriting from a base message class. It includes methods to access response ID, check if the response is a result or error, and retrieve associated JSON objects.

classes.name: Response
classes.description: Represents a JSON-RPC response message in the WebSockets namespace, providing methods to access response details and validate the message.

methods.name: Response
methods.description: Constructor that initializes a new Response object.

methods.name: ~Response
methods.description: Default destructor for the Response class.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the ID associated with this response.

methods.name: isResult
methods.description: Checks if the response contains a successful result.

methods.name: getResult
methods.description: Retrieves the result JSON object of the response if available.

methods.name: isError
methods.description: Checks if the response indicates an error.

methods.name: getError
methods.description: Retrieves the error JSON object of the response if available.

methods.name: isValid
methods.description: Validates if the response message is well-formed and complete.
